WAPCOS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 04 Junior Assistant Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 18, 2025, 16:59 IST
 Water and Power Consultancy Services Limited
 4 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Aug-2025 |  Haryana |  Salary : 19,000 to 66,000




FOLLOW

The Water Resources, Power, and Infrastructure Sectors (WAPCOS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 04 Junior Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed Any Degree can apply for the WAPCOS Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Haryana.

WAPCOS Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Junior Assistant	04	Any Degree

WAPCOS Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 25 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

WAPCOS Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

WAPCOS Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For SC/ST/PWD candidates: NIL.
For Other candidates: Rs. 1000/-.

WAPCOS Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 19,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 66,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the WAPCOS Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the WAPCOS Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned e-mail address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

E-mail Address:

wappersonnel@gmail.com.

Important Dates:

Starting date	11-08-2025
Closing date	27-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Application Form	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
